    </div>

    <div id="connection_error" class="white-content text-left tall">
        <p class="title">Something went wrong</p>
        <p class="text-1">Make sure your computer is connected to <span class="wifi-network">wifi_network_name</span>.</p>
        <p class="text-2">You can also connect your device without Wi-Fi:</p>

        <div class="point point-1">
            <p class="point-text"><strong>1 - Activate USB Transfer</strong></p>
            <p class="point-text">To share documents without Wi-Fi, connect iPhone via USB cable</p>
        </div>

        <div class="point point-2">
            <p class="point-text"><strong>2 - Establish Connection</strong></p>
            <p class="point-text">Follow the link: <a href="http://bonjour-adress.local:8080" class="bonjur-name" target="_blank">http://bonjour-adress.local:8080</a></p>
        </div>

        <a class="close" href="#"></a>
    </div>

    <div id="connection_edge" class="white-content text-left">
        <p class="title">QR-login is not supported by your browser</p>
        <p class="text">To use Wi-Fi Transfer with this browser make sure you are connected to <span class="wifi-network">wifi_network_name</span> and click the link: <a href="http://bonjour-adress.local:8080" class="bonjur-name" target="_blank">http://bonjour-adress.local:8080</a></p>
        <p class="subtitle">Wi-Fi Transfer is compatible with the following browsers:</p>

        <div class="switch text-center active" data-switch="iphone-description" data-tip="iphone-tip">
            <span class="iphone">iPhone</span>
        </div><!--
            --><div class="switch text-center" data-switch="ipad-description" data-tip="ipad-tip">
            <span class="ipad">iPad</span>
        </div>

        <div class="qr-description iphone-description">
            <p class="text">1. Open PDF Expert on your device</p>
            <p class="text">2. Tap <img class="cloud-svg" src="/img/network.svg" /> Services and select <strong>Wi-Fi Transfer</strong></p>
            <p class="text">3. Enter the number you see on your device</p>
        </div>

        <div class="qr-description ipad-description hidden">
            <p class="text">1. Open PDF Expert on your device</p>
            <p class="text">2. Tap <img class="fab-svg" src="/img/add.svg" /> Services and select <strong>Wi-Fi Transfer</strong></p>
            <p class="text">3. Enter the number you see on your device</p>
        </div>

        <p class="help">Still have questions? <a href="https://pdfexpert.com/ios/how-to-transfer-pdf" target="_blank">Check our guide</a></p>
